name: blue-iris
description: Blue Iris is a Windows-based video security software that supports IP and webcam monitoring, motion detection, and recording with advanced alert capabilities. It is widely used for home surveillance and security systems.
features: Video Surveillance: Professional security camera monitoring for Windows. Complete surveillance solution.
IP Camera Support: Works with IP cameras and webcams. Universal compatibility.
Motion Detection: Intelligent motion sensing triggers recording and alerts. Smart monitoring.
Recording Management: Continuous or triggered recording with storage management. Flexible options.
Advanced Alerts: Email, SMS, and push notifications for events. Stay informed.
Remote Access: View cameras from anywhere via web or mobile. Monitor remotely.
Multi-Camera: Support for numerous cameras simultaneously. Scalable system.
Home Security: Widely used for residential surveillance systems. Trusted solution.
